channel.title: Product K-Spice on Goldydocs
channel.description: Recent content in Product K-Spice on Goldydocs

item.title: How-to-install-kspice-python-connector
item.description: Unzip kspice.cp311-win_amd64.pyd.zip Copy the unzipped file(kspice.cp311-win_amd64.pyd) to C:\Program Files (x86)\Kongsberg\K-Spice\bin64 Set the variable PYTHONPATH: C:/Program Files (x86)/Kongsberg/K-Spice/bin64: ref: Original old file: Python API - Getting Started - Overview.pdf

item.title: How-to-save-snapshot-with-customized-name
item.description: Open Postman app in the PC(eg: Zhongfa007). Click the request(“Open the request I have created”) I have created. Change the snapshot name to the one you want(better to match K-Spice style: kebab-case with all small letters) Run K-Spice to a point where you want to save a snapshot. Click “Send” button in Postman . Wait for K-Spice to save the snapshot. after a few seconds, the result will be shown in the Result part of Postman like below (make sure "saveSnapshot": true): { "data": { "controlSimulation": { "saveSnapshot": true } } } 5.

item.title: httplink-hints
item.description: Refer to official help doc for v23.10, Copied from “C:\Program Files (x86)\Kongsberg\K-Spice\Documentation\SimLinks.Net” after K-spice has been installed. Tested -tunnelHost http://* Need to run K-Spice in admin mode in order to make the httpLink work in this case, otherwise error will occur when activating the timeline. Tested setValue: TODO: Regarding -tunnelHost http://*, However, It is highly recommended to use IIS (Internet Information Services) or any other webserver for this purpose instead of setting this option.
